name: Obliteros

trait.name: Blood Frenzy
text: Obliteros has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.

action.name: Bite
text: Melee Weapon Attack: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (3d10 + 6) piercing damage.

description:
An awakened Giant Shark who inhabits the harbor around Mistshore.
Source: Waterdeep: Dragon Heist p. 66
